abstract: Kerim Yildiz, a prominent human rights advocate, had waited nearly a year for a visa to visit the United States. After press coverage, it finally came, though he is none the wiser about what changed.
snippet: Kerim Yildiz, a prominent human rights advocate, had waited nearly a year for a visa to visit the United States. After press coverage, it finally came, though he is none the wiser about what changed.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a year ago, Kerim Yildiz, a prominent advocate for Kurdish rights, applied for a business visa to visit the United States. Then he waited. And then he waited some more.

headline.main: After Mysterious Delay, Mysterious Approval of Kurdish Advocate's Visa
